body_html: Sorry for the delay here. I'm happy to use grpc_tensorflow_server.cc (and maybe add convenience extras to those as necessary). However, I'm not sure my bazel-foo is sufficient to write those build rules correctly (to have a build option to build that .cc with xrt).
body_text: Sorry for the delay here. I'm happy to use grpc_tensorflow_server.cc (and maybe add convenience extras to those as necessary). However, I'm not sure my bazel-foo is sufficient to write those build rules correctly (to have a build option to build that .cc with xrt).
body: Sorry for the delay here. I'm happy to use `grpc_tensorflow_server.cc` (and maybe add convenience extras to those as necessary). However, I'm not sure my bazel-foo is sufficient to write those build rules correctly (to have a build option to build that .cc with xrt).
